name: OCKLabel
desc: A label that handles animating state changes and provides accessibilty features.

items.name: init(textStyle: UIFont.TextStyle, weight: UIFont.Weight)
items.desc: Creates a new label, with a specific text style and font weight.

items.name: var animatesTextChanges: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to animate changes to text.

items.name: var customStyle: OCKStyler?
items.desc: An object that contains constants for styling the view.
